hero.title:
go full-time on
your wildest idea
hero.subtitle:
3x10 is a free program for the 10
most ambitious builders in latam

program.description1: we give you $3,000 to go full time on your idea for 3 days.
program.description2: we're an accelerator for people who ask forgiveness, not permission.
program.description3: you must have already built something. 3 days isn't for starting, it's for pushing further.
program.description4: we want executors. technical builders. people who move fast and make real progress.
program.description5: we're picking 10 people. flying them to santiago, chile. august 2026.

selection.title: only 10 get selected
selection.subtitle: are you the right person for 3x10?
